title: *Betony
seo_description: This Uptown favorite has become a New York classic through Bryce Shuman's creative cuisine and Eamon Rockey's inventive bar menu. Start off the night by taking in the stunning interior and beautiful people over a glass of their house-made Milk Punch. This crystalline concoction can be combined with your favorite spirit to explore classic cocktails in a new light.
content:
Betony Milk Punch

41 W 57th St

walk: 7 minutes

This Uptown favorite has become a New York classic through Bryce Shuman's creative cuisine and Eamon Rockey's inventive bar menu. Start off the night by taking in the stunning interior and beautiful people over a glass of their house-made Milk Punch. This crystalline concoction can be combined with your favorite spirit to explore classic cocktails in a new light.
